betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7This thing is seriously powerful...

The §dProgrammed Circuit Card§f will take your autocrafting capabilities to the next level - if used in an Interface, you can now send patterns containing §9Programmed GregTech Circuits§f, and the Interface will tell the machine to switch its Circuit!

Of course, such power does not come cheap, and you are encouraged to parallelize your processing instead of bottlenecking on a single machine, but this card is incredibly useful in many setups.

Oh, and §4don't§f forget §eBlocking Mode§f!
